text:
Currently have:
  Header directive
  Syntax: Header set|append|add header value
  Syntax: Header unset header
  Context: server config, virtual host, access.conf, .htaccess
  Override: FileInfo
  Status: Extension
  Module: mod_header

I presume that for "Module:" it should be "Module: mod_headers" not mod_header
creator: spm@healthinsite.gov.au
slive@apache.org
text: Indeed.  This will be fixed in the next release.  Thanks.
